root.name: Oids
root.description: Balancing thrust, shields and guns soon gets very hectic! This side on 2D shooter utilises gravity to great effect. You have to balance your use of thrust, shields and guns to try and rescuse the 'Oids' from the Evil Biocretes across many Galaxies which comprise of several Planetoids.As well as the Galaxies that come with the game, you can create your own Galaxies and Planetoids with the built-in editor.
